description: {"blocks":[{"key":"41sfj","text":"This is the 10X Genomics Single Cell 5' Gene Expression hybrid protocol using nuclei suspension isolated from fresh, frozen human ovary explants. The Chromium X  (PN-1000331) was used for Gem Generation, and the Chromium Connect (PN-1000171) was used for preparing Gene expression libraries from cDNA inputs. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

forks.title: Protocol for Nuclei Isolation and Automated 10X Genomics Single Cell 5' Gene Expression for Human Ovary Explants

protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"auvkq","text":"The following protocols from 10X Genomics were used for the different steps: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvuii","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"770f3","text":"Nuclei Isolation:  CG000505 REV A","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejecp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lap8","text":"Chromium Next GEM Single Cell 5'Reagent Kits v2 (Dual Index). GEM Generation, Barcoding, Post GEM-RT Cleanup and cDNA Amplification using manual workflow:  CG000331 Rev E.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbeui","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eftdt","text":"Chromium Next GEMSingle Cell 5'Reagent Kits v2 (Dual Index). status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Nuclei Isolation Protocol for Human Ovary Explants
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"70v5g","text":"Chapter 1—Single Cell Gene Expression \u0026 Chromium Fixed RNA Profiling of the protocol CG000505 REV A was used to isolate nuclei from frozen human ovary explants with the following modifications: 1) a cordless motor pestle (VWR, Catalog number 47747-370) was used for Step f, Page 30 and 2) the samples were incubated for 15 min on ice for Step h, Page 30. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7q1t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b96l3","text":"https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/single-cell-gene-expression/documentation/steps/sample-prep/chromium-nuclei-isolation-kit-sample-prep-user-guide","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":148}],"data":{}},{"key":"5u5bc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"609v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"66FF5BADEC7011EE9FCF0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/single-cell-gene-expression/documentation/steps/sample-prep/chromium-nuclei-isolation-kit-sample-prep-user-guide"}}}}

steps.section: Chromium Next GEM Single Cell 5'Reagent Kits v2 (Dual Index). GEM Generation, Barcoding, Post GEM-RT Cleanup and cDNA Amplification.
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9etju","text":"Step 1 and step 2 of protocol CG000331 REV E were used for GEM Generation, Barcoding, Post GEM-RT Cleanup, and cDNA Amplification. The Chromium X was used for Gem Generation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78iik","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhpql","text":"https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/single-cell-immune-profiling/documentation/steps/library-prep/chromium-single-cell-5-reagent-kits-user-guide-v-2-chemistry-dual-index\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":169}],"data":{}},{"key":"87vb7","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74k7t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"362C316AEC7111EE9FCF0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/single-cell-immune-profiling/documentation/steps/library-prep/chromium-single-cell-5-reagent-kits-user-guide-v-2-chemistry-dual-index"}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"52ntk","text":"The protocol  CG000474 Rev B was used for Automated Gene expression dual index library construction from cDNA inputs.
